altername_name: Rijexamen Training 2008: Code de la Route 2008
Rijexamen Training: Code de la Route
name: Code de la Route: Edition 2008
overview: A game that can teach you how to drive! The latest French rules and laws to be successful at your driving license exam! The exam mode consists of 40 questions out of 800 possible questions. Questions on the ASSR are also available, and at the end of each test, an instructor comes to highlight your strengths and weaknesses. Wireless minigames to play and memorize useful information.
